#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t;

int n,i,val=0,maxm=-1,k;
vector<int> v;

scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{scanf("%d",&k);
if(i%2==0)
val+=k;
else val-=k;
if(maxm<val){
v.push_back(i+1);
maxm=val;}
}
for(i=0;i<(int)v.size();i++)
printf("%d ",v[i]);
cout<<endl;
if(maxm==val)
printf("SUCCESS\n");
else printf("FAIL\n");

return 0;
}
